name: Phobos (itch) (Woyboy)
description:
Phobos is a 3D first-person horror game. You have finally woken up from your accident in a hospital, but the scenery depicts an eerie atmosphere. As you investigate the hospital, you learn the events inside and outside the hospital driving you to escape. Learn and understand the behaviors of the mysterious creatures in the hospital in order to survive. Craft necessary items and manage your inventory to last you through the escape. Help your character Sam escape this hell. 

This game is NOT finished but is actively being worked on. There will be bugs. Have fun
